item.description:
*Clown around at Yogibo*

FREE

Join Yogibo and MetroWest Mothers & More on Saturday, August 14 from 10 AM â€“
12 PM, at the new Yogibo retail store at Natick Collection for a morning of
laughter and fun!

Davie the Clown will entertain with silly juggling, amazing magic,
incredible tricks, balloon sculptures and tons of audience participation.
Play around on the ultra comfortable Yogibo lounge chairs, enjoy snacks and
refreshments and a special discount on Yogibo products for event guests!

Our chapter will receive a portion of any sales. But, the entertainment is free! Please bring your kids. There will be information on Mothers & More including brochures onsite.

Yogibo is located at Natick Collection (adjacent to JC Penny)

1245 Worcester St.

Natick, MA 01760

508.545.1792

www.yogibo.com
item.name: *KIDS* Clown Around at Yogibo
